g:HTMLPanel.p:
The Editor chapter shows how to use the different types of editors and drivers in the Editor framework.
This demo shows some of them in action.

Employees example - This is a simple example where SimpleBeanEditorDriver have been used to edit and flush data into a simple Employee class.
The example uses the Editor type to manipulate the backing object.
Phone book example - This example uses SimpleBeanEditorDriver. The example uses a no-arg method-defined editor.

Contacts - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver to manipulate contact data; this is based on the earlier RequestFactory example.
The examples uses ValueAwareEditor, ListEditor, and Editor.

List contacts - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver to list all contacts created in the Contacts example, ListAllContactsView.
This example shows how to use the HasDataEditor adapter.

List contacts 2 - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver to list all contacts created in the Contacts example, ListAllContactsEditor.
This example shows how to use CompositeEditor and LeafValueEditor.
